lead_paragraph: A United States appeals court overturned a $120 million jury verdict against Samsung, handing the company a significant victory in a longstanding patent feud with Apple.

headline.print_headline: Appeals Court Overturns Apple’s Win Over Samsung
headline.main: Appeals Court Overturns Apple’s Win Over Samsung

snippet: A United States appeals court overturned a $120 million jury verdict against Samsung, handing the company a significant victory in a longstanding patent feud with Apple.
abstract: United States Court of Appeals in Washington overturns $120 million jury verdict against Samsung, giving firm big victory in longstanding patent feud with Apple.
